Desc.entry: UKCP Registered Psychotherapist, Member of Hallam Institute of Psychotherapy. Provides psychodynamic psychotherapy. Works with individuals and couples on a range of problems, eg anxiety, difficulties in communication and relationships, depression, work-related stress. Service is available by arrangement with open referral. Costs approx Â£30 for a 1 hour session, some concessions available on a sliding scale. Please contact for up-to-date details of prices.
